TITLE: Episode 17 - Mini-Rant: Compassion and The Economy Are Not Mutually Exclusive
DESCRIPTION: This time, we tackle the false idea that the economy and compassion cannot exist together and also talk about how terribly Libertarians are fumbling our biggest chance to turn people toward liberty.
CONTENT: This time, we tackle the false idea that the economy and compassion cannot exist together and also talk about how terribly Libertarians are fumbling our biggest chance to turn people toward liberty.
